description: A React functional component named FoodCard for displaying information about a food item, including its image, name, description, category, restaurant name, and price. The component is implemented as a presentational component with props for data display and user interaction.

methods.name: FoodCard({ food, restaurantName, onClick })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a food item card with interactive capabilities.
